Everyone who's bothered by the ram consumption should stop looking at stats and start realizing it doesn't really matter. Atom is great.

yes, nothing to add. It has make me waste enough precious time in my life...
The one piece of software I will ever need when it comes to text editors for programming.

Started using this baby when I was first learning Python. Really recommend. Only thing that I would say triumphs it is Pycharm but that is only because of the integrated terminal etc. Atom is by far more visually appealing & easy to use. Well done devs!
Great for editing

I am using Atom as my main editor for Python, C/C++ ,Web related apps (HTML, CSS, JSX, etc.) and for many other scripting stuff; about 4 years now. I like to have my own customization and with atom it's easy to make changes. I do want an IDE environment but if I need I can change my settings to do so. Git is working perfect with atom. Also the ability of Teletype is cool thing to have. Less ram usage than most IDEs and VS code. Kite autocomplete for Python should expand for other languages too Overall, I think Atom and Sublime are the only two options you have for general use-cases. (VIM is not for all ;) ).
summary: Great app, definitely, I would recommend!

description: Durante el año pasado un compañero de clase me lo recomendo por la facilidad de usar y el poder realizar proyectos en grupo mas facilmente y basicamente me enamoro, despues de que se acabaran las clases no volvi a abrir la aplicacion(o mejor dicho intentar) hasta febrero de este año pero ni por el terminal ni por el icono se abre, ya prove reinstalar la aplicación, actualizar el sistema operativo a la ultima versión y descargarlo desde el terminal pero el resultado es el mismo, realmente es un software muy recomendable pues el autocompletado de las ordenes hace la vida mucho mas facil y el realizar largos proyectos mucho mas llevadero y comodo, le habria dado las 5 estrellas si no hubiera tenido este problema que me hace imposible el usar este software.
summary: Me encanta pero ya no se abre
